## CalibrationResult class

Result of the calibration, returned by [playwrightCalibrate()](./assistive-playwright-client.playwrightcalibrate.md)<!-- -->, and allowing to translate coordinates relative to the top-left corner of the viewport, or coordinates relative to the center of a DOM element into screen coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CalibrationResult implements ScreenPosition 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ScreenPosition](./vm-providers.screenposition.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(x, y, screenWidth, screenHeight, vm, frame)](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationresult._constructor_.md) |  | Creates an instance of [CalibrationError](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationerror.md)<!-- -->, containing the coordinates of the viewport inside the browser window. An object of this class is returned by [playwrightCalibrate()](./assistive-playwright-client.playwrightcalibrate.md) if the calibration succeeds. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [frame](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationresult.frame.md) |  | Page \| Frame | Reference to the playwright frame object. |
|  [screenHeight](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationresult.screenheight.md) |  | number | Height of the screen in pixels. |
|  [screenWidth](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationresult.screenwidth.md) |  | number | Width of the screen in pixels. |
|  [vm](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationresult.vm.md) |  | [VM](./vm-providers.vm.md) | Reference to the virtual machine. |
|  [x](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationresult.x.md) |  | number | Horizontal coordinate of the viewport inside the browser window. |
|  [y](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationresult.y.md) |  | number | Vertical coordinate of the viewport inside the browser window. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [translateCoordinates(position, origin)](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationresult.translatecoordinates.md) |  | Translates viewport coordinates or coordinates relative to the center of a DOM element into screen coordinates. |
